text: Leo Hendrik Baekeland (Ghent , November 14, 1863 â€“ February 23, 1944) was a Belgian chemist. He invented Velox photographic paper (1893). He also made Bakelite (1907), an inexpensive, nonflammable, versatile, and popular plastic, which marks the beginning of the modern plastics industry. ==References== Category:1863 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Belgian chemists Category:Belgian inventors Category:Scientists from Ghent Category:Scientists from Florida
